resources.string: \t\tBreather - is a noncommercial project of students team "Quantum_dev" from National University "Lviv Politehnic". We are focused on a very common and dangerous problem - air pollution. So the main aim of our project is to allow users to control the level of air pollution in theirs homes. Due to our sensors you can keep track of the temperature , humidity and gas level wherever you are at any time. Our website and mobile app will help users to receive information in easy and clear way. Be aware of any air changes in their homes. Be safe.
